Learnwox browser extension is a handy tool for students and instructors which allows them to easily search for videos on YouTube in the educational category and bookmark them.

How to use:
Simply enter your search query and browse through the list of videos which come from the educational category of YouTube, find what youâ€™re looking for, watch it on YouTube or add it to the built-in library for later use. 
More websites(E.g. Udemy, Skillshare) will be added in the later versions.
